If this PR addresses or depends on an issue, paste the issue number above or create one using a template below:

- High-priority / Epic: [Create High issue](https://github.com/Azertoxe/Template-test/issues/new?template=high.yml)
- Medium-priority: [Create Medium issue](https://github.com/Azertoxe/Template-test/issues/new?template=medium.yml)
- Low-priority: [Create Low issue](https://github.com/Azertoxe/Template-test/issues/new?template=low.yml)

- Feature request: [Create Feature request](https://github.com/Azertoxe/Template-test/issues/new?template=feature_request.md)

Paste the created issue number (for example `#123`) into the `Related issue` field above so the PR and issue are linked.
